content: I'm wondering exactly what's required in the codeSystem.version.filter property of this new resource. I expected to see something akin to the CodeSystem.FilterComponent which includes values from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/filter-operator. What I find is an 'op' element for 'operations supported for this property' - is that meant to contain operation codes, such as 'CodeSystem-subsumes'?
it has both code and op - so for 'concept' I support = and in
